name: dbCHOPPER Food Chopper
description:
The patented, simple solution for chopping meat while cooking. An at home tool that grounds meat, shreds slow cooked meats, chops herbs and dices vegetables and fruit, mixes and mashes in one bowl. Safe to use on skillet and surfaces, without scratching.

Grip the handle or shaft and push down in a pumping motion. It's that easy! This lays flat to fit conveniently in kitchen drawers. The rapid, spring-loaded, 3-solid blade system makes quick work of any food prep. It's easy to clean and can go in the top rack of your dishwasher!
